1.name: Pym Punch
1.description: With the help of his Pym Particles, Ant-Man delivers a micro-sized uppercut punch.

2.name: Ant Swarm
2.description: Ant-Man launches a swarm of angry bullet ants to eat away at his opponent. Millions of tiny ants leads to millions of tiny stings.

3.name: Ant-Sized Knockout
3.description: With an extra potent dose of Pym Particles, Ant-Man delivers a combo of miniature knockout punches.

signature.name: Pym Gas Control
signature.description: Ant-Man subtly alters his size during combat, reducing the impact of enemy attacks.

description: When the original Ant-Man retired from the job, another man rose to the occasion (err, stole the costume) â€“ Scott Lang! With his somewhat sordid past somewhat behind him, Scott took on the size-changing, ant-communicating abilities of Ant-Man!
